name: @f8n/rainmaker-discovery
description: Rainmaker Discovery - Semantic search and adaptation of proven code components

scripts.dev:all: bunx --bun concurrently "bun run dev:api" "bun run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:all: bun run --cwd packages/frontend build && bun run --cwd packages/api build && bun run build:nightwatch && bun run build:discovery
scripts.test: bun run test:schema && bun run test:api && bun run test:frontend && bun run test:nightwatch
scripts.test:watch: bunx --bun concurrently "bun run --cwd packages/api test:watch" "bun run --cwd packages/frontend test:watch"
scripts.test:coverage: bunx --bun concurrently "bun run --cwd packages/api test:coverage" "bun run --cwd packages/frontend test:coverage"
